Package edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman

Class Ghost

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman.Character
      • edu.ucsb.cs56.projects.games.pacman.Ghost

  • public class Ghost
extends Character
    A class used to represent the ghost enemies used for AI-controlled ghosts in the standard mode and for player controlled ghosts in multiplayer
    Version:
    CS56 F17
    Author:
    Dario Castellanos Anaya, Daniel Ly, Kelvin Yang, Joseph Kompella, Kekoa Sato, Nicholas Duncan, Wei Tung Chen

        playerNum - a number to indicate which player is controlling this ghost
